Director: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske
Screenwriter: Ted Sears, Erdman Penner, Bill Peet, Joe Rinaldi, Milt Banta, Ralph Wright, William Cottrell
Distributor: RKO Radio Pictures, Buena Vista Pictures
Synopsis: In this Disney animated film, Wendy (Kathryn Beaumont) and her two brothers are amazed when a magical boy named Peter Pan (Bobby Driscoll) flies into their bedroom, supposedly in pursuit of his rebellious shadow. He and his fairy friend, Tinkerbell, come from a far-off place called Neverland, where children stay perpetually young. Enchanted, the kids follow him back. But when Pan's nemesis, the pirate Captain Hook (Hans Conried), causes trouble, the kids begin to miss their old life.
Title: Peter Pan
